titleStmt.title: Post nubila Phoebus. Nihil absque Deo.
titleStmt.author: Read, William, Sir, d. 1715

notesStmt.note: At foot: "He is to be spoken with at Mr. Agutters a musical-instrument-maker, at the sign of the Crown, over-against York-Buildings in the Strand, from 8 in the morning till 6 in the evening, where you will see a bill of operations hang at the door.".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
